name: cocolis/cocoliswoocommerce
description: Cocolis Woocommerce Plugin to add Cocolis.fr as a delivery method

scripts.wp-package: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat composer.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && zip -r cocolis-v$PACKAGE_VERSION.zip cocolis readme.txt
